themes: Integration of academic and self-taught artists
Cross-pollination between art and other fields (science, nature, history, music)
Need for investment in under-recognized artists
Recognition and support for artists lacking resources
key_phrases: exhibitions that include work by academic and self taught artists together
visual art meets science or nature or history or music
investment and promotion of arts and artists who are doing the work but never have budgets to work with and never get recognition
barriers_identified: lack of recognition for certain artists
solutions_proposed: create exhibitions that include both academic and self-taught artists
develop interdisciplinary programs (art meets science, nature, history, music)
invest in and promote artists who lack resources and recognition
